H3.text: what movies gerard butler has been in. 300

A4.text: he took the lead in several 2009 films including the thriller Law Abiding Citizen with Jamie Foxx.

A5.text: he gained worldwide recognition for his portrayal of King Leonidas in Zack Snyder's 2007 fantasy war film 300.

A6.text: He starred in the Neveldine/Taylor film Gamer, The Ugly Truth and Law Abiding Citizen, which he also co-produced.

A7.text: Butler had further action film roles in Geostorm (2017).
